name: Ming's Plane
description:
●Do you still remember that play paper planes with friends in childhood? Now, let’s join Ming and his toy planes and bring the memory back!
●In Ming’s Plane, you can collect diverse planes, derss up Ming in different costumes and above all, use your finger to make Ming sprint, throw, get powerups, avoid birds, break record and shock your friends!

Highlights:
●Adorable and Fresh grahics and special effects
●Different planes, different properties
●Needs only 1 finger to play
●Random powerups make you invincible
●Dozens of achievements are waiting for you to unlock
